name: Fallen Oaks
description:
When the director of a small-time TV show disappears, a chain of events unfold that lead a young actress to search the town of Fallen Oaks only to discover that far stranger things are going on in the recession ridden place than initially meet the eye. To make matters even worse: A cataclysmic event is about to occur and there are only 56 hours left to prevent it…

  • Old-school adventure game mechanics meet time-pressure: You have 56 in-game-hours to solve the mystery
  • Day/Night-Cycle: NPCs will be on different locations depending on day and time.
  • Enormous Freedom: Spend the night in the local bar or search the dark woods. It's up to you!
  • All decisions matter: Be careful who you trust and where you go. You can die!
  • High replayability: Discover all the secrets of Fallen Oaks
